author: Garrett Jones
comment: Neat interface and definitely something I would enjoy using if not for a few issues. 1. Retracting animation is too slow, please speed up. 2. Show the entire number to be dialed. 3. Be able to backspace a number without having to flick your wrist and dump everything.  Very novel approach to the wrist dialer and with some tweaking you'll have a five star app!

reply.author: Tran Hoang Nhat
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback! Issue #1 and #3 will be resolved in the next update, but issue #2 is pretty hard to deal with, since the screen size is really small. Stay tune!
